name: Cell Trap Multiplayer
description:
THE ULTIMATE ADDICTION IS HERE !!
Don't download unless u want your life to be sucked away in numbers and puzzles - by TracieRae

This is just not another number game, its a TRAP !!! so be careful !!!
In this Unique game of number joining you will have to use your talent to combine 4 same numbers but in such a way that they keep on forming big numbers without getting the board filled up.
Now Play with your friends as well as any random opponent in a one to one real time Cell Trap Battle.

Five Modes :
1.Classic
2.Extreme
3.Multiplayer
4.Blocks Classic
5.Blocks Extreme

Some of the reviews by our Users :

- Super Addictive i keep playing even at work - Allstars0323
- Endless Fun - To others i describe as much improved version of 2048 or Drop 7 - MarymeQ
- This is a great option for anyone who enjoys puzzle games and when they say addictive they aren't lying ! - Muttleys Girl


Happy Cell Trapping !!
